author: theFox
long_description:
# modutil
A utility mod for minetetest providing useful utilities that can be used in other mods.
Goal of this mod is outsourcing utilities as well as unifying utilities.
Feel free to suggest more utilities that should be added.
Suggestions can be made to make your mods smaller or just if you need help with your own mods.
## features
Some of the utilities are log, translation boilerplate, string operations, etc.
For a full feature and usage list see the [README](https://github.com/theFox6/modutil#modutil).
## latest breaking changes
* The "VenusParser" was renamed to "LuaVenusCompiler"
* The module "log" was renamed to "logging".
name: modutil
short_description: Providing some utilities that can be used by other mods.
title: mod utilities
